Problem 1:  Pups

###################################

getwd()
names(pups_data) #lists variable names
clean_names(pups_data) #lowercases variable names and tibbles data
tail(pups_data, 5) #last five
head(pups_data) #first six

```{r importing data, warning = FALSE, message = FALSE}
pups_data = read_csv(file = "./data/FAS_pups.csv") %>% 
  clean_names() %>% 
  select(-c(2)) %>%                             #removing sex column as key is n/a
  arrange(litter_number)
pups_data

length(unique(pups_data$id))

##############
# avg ears
##############
ears = pups_data %>%            
  select(-c(3:5)) %>% 
  group_by(litter_number) %>% 
  mutate(
    "avg_pd_ears" = round(mean(pd_ears), 1)
    ) %>% 
  select(-c(2)) %>% 
  filter(!duplicated(litter_number))
ears


##############
# avg eyes
##############
eyes = pups_data %>%                            
  select(-c(2, 4, 5)) %>% 
  group_by(litter_number) %>% 
  mutate(
    "avg_pd_eyes" = round(mean(pd_eyes), 1)
    ) %>% 
  select(-c(2)) %>% 
  filter(!duplicated(litter_number))
eyes


##############
# avg pivot
##############
pivot = pups_data %>%
  select(-c(2, 3, 5)) %>% 
  group_by(litter_number) %>% 
  mutate(
    "avg_pd_pivot" = round(mean(pd_pivot), 1)
    ) %>% 
  select(-c(2)) %>% 
  filter(!duplicated(litter_number))
pivot


##############
# avg walk
##############
walk = pups_data %>%
  select(-c(2:4)) %>% 
  group_by(litter_number) %>% 
  mutate(
    "avg_pd_walk" = round(mean(pd_walk), 1)
    ) %>% 
  select(-c(2)) %>% 
  filter(!duplicated(litter_number))
walk

pups = data.frame(ears, pivot, walk, eyes) %>% #no merge() b/c joining 4 df's, not 2
  mutate("id" = labels(litter_number)) %>%
  select(-c(1,3,5,7)) 
pups
```
